author: rhuijben
msg: Simplify the post update revision bumper by folding a function into its
only caller and by using more of the same behavior for files and directories.
(bump_node): Fold this function into its only caller which
(bump_nodes): ... this and rename the resulting function to
(bump_node_revision): ... this. This allows removing a call to base_get_info
for every node. It also simplifies the loop/recursion checking which
was previously split over two places.

author: xuhaihong
msg: b. Remove committed changes in Axis2 from Geronimo side
c. Add some new changes on Geronimo side, check the parameter style before checking the wrapper class

author: joern
msg: UIMA-2100 Now mentions the output format which is used to serialize CASes
